data.message: Maybe now people will hear Eminem's older hits and new songs on the same CD and realize how much he sucks now. I hope one of his greatest hits on there has him making fun of pop stars and then to have him working with pop stars with the new music on his cd...

replies.message: Honestly he should have just left  slim shady alone he already fucked up mmlp
haha you think he sucks now? lol
"MMLP2" is a fucking disgrace to the Marshall Mathers LP.
He makes fun of people complaining that he turned pop....but he used to make fun of pop and he used to say he'll never do shit like that. He's a hypocrite.
I don't think he ever said all pop stars are bad. Typical ignorant hater
I think his rhyme structure and songwriting are better than they have ever been
So what if the subject matter has changed over the year. His shit is real and always has been
Your not a true Eminem fan sir

to any body who has followed eminems shit through to the marshal matthers lp 2 you should pay attention to the lyrics and watch some cyphers with him and slaughterhouse and yelawolf and interviews he had he doesn't suck he just recognizes he's not as famous as he was before
he grew up.. too bad you didn't..
